channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Machine Learning and Data Analytics Lab, FAU Erlangen Nürnberg, Germany on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: On the Scalability of Certified Adversarial Robustness with Generated Data
item.description: Boosting certified robustness of machine learning models by 3-4% using generated data from diffusion models!
